items.name: Quantum Oscillator
items.description: A device that manipulates subatomic particles to generate oscillating energy fields.

items.name: Nebula Harvester
items.description: An interstellar machine designed to collect and process rare gases from distant nebulae.

items.name: Chronosphere
items.description: A spherical apparatus capable of creating localized time dilation effects.

items.name: Bionic Synapse Enhancer
items.description: An implantable neural interface that accelerates synaptic connections in the brain.

items.name: Gravity Nullifier
items.description: A compact device that can create zones of zero gravity within a defined area.

items.name: Holographic Memory Crystal
items.description: A crystal matrix capable of storing vast amounts of data in holographic form.
